episodes.episodeTitle: Pilot: The Streets of San Francisco
episodes.episodeDescription: Gritty crime drama set in San Francisco, featuring an older, veteran cop and his younger, less experienced partner.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Andrew Duggan, Tom Bosley, John Rubinstein, Carmen Mathews, Edward Andrews, Lawrence Dobkin

locations.locationInfo: Opening scene where Holly Berry's body was found floating
Where Stone and Keller meet David Farr before having him identify the body in the morgue.
Holly's apartment run by Richie Serretti
David Farr's apartment at 2190 Washington St, apartment 1002
Plantation Inn, hotel where Farr takes Holly Barry, room 3C. This is now Hotel Del Sol
Texaco gas station where Delbert worked, this is now a Fuel 24:7 station
Photobooth where Holly took her photos
Machine where Holly laminates David's business card
Where Keller enters Chinatown looking for the Karate studio
Kenji Karate Studio where Keller goes to ask about David Farr
Where David Farr's kept his boat. Stone and Keller talk to boat owners Joe & Sally Kaswell on their boat Flash Cut
Grass Roots Club at 53 Osgood Place, where David talks to the band's drummer to find out where Delbert is
Abandoned Ice House where Farr finds Delbert hiding out, this is now called TeleGraph LandingG Condos
Where Stone tells Keller about Gregory Praxas
Where Stone and Kellar confront Gregory Praxas and save David Farr. The house has it as 21 125th Ave, but the current address is 1 125th Ave
St Joseph's Hospital at 355 Buena Vista Avenue East. The final scene shows Stone and Keller's car leaving the parking lot after visiting David Farr and driving east on Buena Vista Ave E

episodes.episodeDescription: A thirty-year veteran beat cop and longtime friend of Stone's is shot during an attempted robbery. Stone sets off with a vendetta to get the gunman, blurring the line between professional and personal.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Edmond O'Brien, Tim O'Connor, David Opatoshu, Eileen Heckart

locations.locationInfo: Joseph's Jewlers where Gus gets shot

episodes.episodeDescription: A would-be Jack The Ripper stalks the city, slashing to death prostitutes. Stone assigns a resistant Keller with protecting a prostitute who has been threatened.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Janice Rule, James Olson

locations.locationInfo: The Orphanage Lounge where Beverly Landau gets stabbed outside

episodes.episodeDescription: A businessman who flew in from Los Angeles (the time it takes to fly from L.A. to S.F. is the source of the title) for a convention meets a woman at the convention center and agrees to join her on her houseboat in nearby Sausalito. They get into an argument and he winds up striking her on the head and fleeing. The woman's boyfriend gets home, gets into an argument with her and again bashes her on the head, killing her. The businessman is the prime suspect in the murder because he was seen arriving at and then fleeing the crime scene.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: William Windom, Dick van Patten

locations.locationInfo: Where Russell Rankin picks up Lita on the corner.

episodes.episodeDescription: Stone and Keller contend with an AWOL Vietnam War soldier determined to abduct a five-year-old child.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: James Stacy, Linda Marsh

locations.locationInfo: Joan Geneti's apartment at 1552 Greenwich Apt 4

episodes.episodeDescription: Stone and Keller uncover the seedy world of escort services when their suspect is a cultured art collector with a Pygmalion complex who hires escorts determined to create in them his idealized woman.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Stefanie Powers, Edward Mulhare, Vic Tayback

locations.locationInfo: Where Amery takes Kim at the end of the evening.

episodes.episodeDescription: Stone is sidelined with a broken ankle, so Keller teams up with hot-headed Inspector Jim Martin to track down a young Mexican suspected of murder. But Martin's prejudice against Mexicans threatens the investigation's success.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: David Soul , A Martinez

locations.locationInfo: Where Mike and Inspector Martin are coming back from the produce market.

episodes.episodeDescription: When a parolee whom Stone once coached in the Police Athletic League is accused of murdering another ex-con, Stone, Keller and a caring social worker rally to his defense.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Peter Strauss, Bernie Casey, Elaine Giftos

locations.locationInfo: Where the sniper, Daryl LeBeau, waits to kill Herb Shako

episodes.episodeDescription: A city official is murdered in a botched mugging by a gang of three sophisticated criminals unaware of his high profile. The mayor, convinced it was a political assassination, orders Stone and Keller to crack the case.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: David Wayne, Ramon Bieri, Robert Foxworth

locations.locationInfo: Where Wally sells his papers to the people on the Cable Car.

episodes.episodeDescription: Two young women are found murdered in a swinging singles apartment complex. As Stone and Keller investigate, they uncover multiple suspects with a motive to murder the two gold-digging, teasing takers.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Harold Gould, Michael Lerner, Vic Tayback

locations.locationInfo: xxxx

episodes.episodeDescription: A band of modern-day Gypsies descends on San Francisco, its aging patriarch unaware that the younger generation has moved on from the traditional flim-flam to million-dollar heists and murder.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: George Voskovec, Michael Ansara

locations.locationInfo: Open shot of the stolen power company truck parking to get into the sewer system.

episodes.episodeDescription: An ex-con college professor takes a bullet to the shoulder when a hit-man murders a blackmailer. But the professor refuses to have the bullet removed, and the hit-man is hot on his trail to recover the incriminating bullet.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Carl Betz, Geraldine Brooks

locations.locationInfo: Capri Motel where Victor A Coyle stays in room #105

episodes.episodeDescription: Stone oversteps his authority when he entrusts to a traditional Greek patriarch his ex-con son just released from San Quentin. When the son is implicated in a suspicious fire, Stone and Keller's investigation uncovers ugly family secrets.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Paul Michael Glaser, Scott Marlowe, Nehemiah Persoff

locations.locationInfo: Where Jason Kampacalas gets dropped off after being released from San Juaintan.

episodes.episodeDescription: An artist is thrown to his death from his apartment window. Stone and Keller's investigation centers on the daughter of a renowned eccentric poet, who sets to spinning a web of deception to deflect the dogged detectives from her trail.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Roscoe Lee Browne, Brenda Sykes

locations.locationInfo: Apartment above Napoli Market where Rob Evanhauer gets pushed out the window.

episodes.episodeDescription: Two crusty fishermen at sea stumble upon an illegal alien smuggling ring. The smugglers murder one of the fishermen and pressure the second into silence, stymieing Stone and Keller's investigation.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Nicholas Colasanto, Anthony Caruso, Victor French

locations.locationInfo: Where Joe Protruro sees his partner Lou Roselli get killed.

episodes.episodeDescription: In her zeal to capture a serial rapist, a rookie cop flouts Stone's orders, jeopardizing not only Stone and Keller's carefully choreographed stake out but her own life.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Brenda Vaccaro, Michael Burns

locations.locationInfo: Where Sherri Reese has coffee with victim Nancy Conners to get more information on the rapist.

episodes.episodeDescription: A hit man living a new life with a family in France is lured out of retirement by his former employer, a crime kingpin determined to rub out every witness to a murder he committed.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Stuart Whitman, Jack Albertson, Jason Evers, Claudine Longet

locations.locationInfo: Johnny Harmon's House

episodes.episodeDescription: A greed-consumed numismatist plots to switch a wealthy collector's gold double-eagle coins with counterfeits, using and abusing his trusting accomplices along the way.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Joseph Cotten, John Saxon, Belinda Montgomery, Jamie Farr

locations.locationInfo: Hotel where Ernie stays

episodes.episodeDescription: A war among gambling bosses is being waged. Stone and Keller attempt to locate and protect a vital witness from a hit man who has charmed his way into a lonely schoolteacher's apartment in order to secure a clear shot at his victim.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Steve Forrest, Shirley Knight, Richard Anderson, Michael Strong

locations.locationInfo: Opening Scene showing Santa Claus and Christmas Tree walking in front of 4068 24th St

episodes.episodeDescription: A veteran newspaper columnist and longtime friend of Stone's accidentally kills his young, two-timing mistress and then attempts to pin the rap on the young stage actor she was seeing.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Barry Sullivan, Geoffrey Deuel, Greg Mullavey, Tommy Kirk

locations.locationInfo: American Conservatory Theater where Mike and Steve go to look for Peter Anthony

episodes.episodeDescription: Stone is held hostage by the Cobras street-gang, which demands an exchange for its wounded leader who was captured in a bungled robbery. Keller and Devitt scour the city's seamy underside in their search for their friend and colleague.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Tim O'Connor, Cal Bellini, Brian Tochi

locations.locationInfo: xxxxx

episodes.episodeDescription: Three young boys open a Pandora's Box when they sneak into an eccentric old man's home, a mysterious house rumored by their parents to contain a million-dollar treasure.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Lew Ayres, Albert Salmi, Clint Howard, Joyce Van Patten

locations.locationInfo: xxxxx

episodes.episodeDescription: A homicidal rapist that Stone had put away twelve years earlier is released and begins waging psychological warfare on Stone by stalking his daughter Jeannie.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Joe Don Baker, Darlene Carr

locations.locationInfo: Bus station where Jeannie's roommate Val gets stabbed

episodes.episodeDescription: A child is murdered in a bungled burglary and the killer is set free on a legal technicality. Despite Stone's strenuous objections, the grieving father is determined to take justice into his own hands.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Ed Nelson, Kaz Garas, John Kerr

locations.locationInfo: Where the boy was murdered. They say it's Austin St on the show

episodes.episodeDescription: A high-powered Commerce Dept. official is harpooned on a pleasure boat. Stone and Keller sift through the suspects, among whom are a senator, a boat builder and the grieving widow, who is an old friend of Stone's from the Potrero.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Barbara Rush, Jim Davis, Dick Sargent

locations.locationInfo: Opening scene of boat in the bay

episodes.episodeDescription: A priest won't tell Stone where a murderer is hiding. Meantime, drug smugglers look for a stolen shipment of heroin.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Richard Egan, Charles Aidman

locations.locationInfo: Where cops see Father helping a drunken Harry celebrating the birth of his son.

episodes.episodeDescription: After three winos are brutally beaten to death, Stone goes undercover as a bum to crack the case.
episodes.episodeGuestStars: Leslie Nielsen, Dean Stockwell

locations.locationInfo: Where Stone and Keller walk to discuss suspects
